   sphinx-quickstart on Fri Jan 23 23:52:23 2026.

   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Mensabot documentation
======================

This documentation describes the software components of the Mensabot system.
It provides an overview of the project structure, Python ROS 2 nodes, and
launch files used to start and visualize the robot.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   overview
   python_nodes
   launch_files
